title: Cajun tuna with pea & bean mash

ingredients.item: 1 tsp olive oil, plus extra to drizzle
400g can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed

instructions.step: Brush the tuna in the olive oil and toss in the Cajun seasoning. Griddle for 2 minutes each side or to taste.
Meanwhile, cook the peas and beans in boiling water for 4 minutes, drain and coarsely mash
Microwave the spinach in a large bowl for 1 minute or until just wilted. Serve the tuna on a bed of mash with the spinach and olive oil to drizzle.
